name: Eremite Axe Vanguard
description: A member of a loosely-organized mercenary corps from the golden desert sands. Will work for anyone as long as the pay is good.\nThese ax-wielding ladies often wade into the slaughter without fear, creating openings for their comrades to capitalize on.\nThey will sometimes sit by the fireside in their sand-swept homeland and play songs that were lost in that golden sea.
